product_name: REI Merino Wool Crew Socks - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With light cushioning and a warm wool blend, the REI Merino Wool Crew Socks are sure to be a hit with young outdoor adventurers. Supersoft merino wool/nylon blend delivers moisture-wicking performance and itch-free comfort. Elastic arch braces hold socks in place and promote circulation; spandex knit throughout creates a memory fit. Soft underfoot padding cushions steps; padded insteps relieve pressure from laces. Closeout.
short_description: With light cushioning and a warm wool blend, the REI Merino Wool Crew Socks are sure to be a hit with young outdoor adventurers.
